title: Kylie Jenner Breaks Silence On Travis Scott Split To Address Spicy Tyga Rumours
text:
Cosmetics billionaire Kylie Jenner has not denied allegations that she and Travis Scott have ended their relationship, instead using her first public statement on the matter to praise her ongoing “friendship” with the rapper.

Jenner, who has reportedly split from Scott after two years and one baby, today disputed recent claims she recently visited her former partner Tyga in a late-night rendezvous.

Taking to social media, Jenner said the visit was just a casual trip with friends to “a studio that [Tyga] happened to be at.”

But the message has more to say about Scott than anyone else.

“The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is,” Jenner said.

“There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at. Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi ‼️ our friendship and our daughter is priority.

Being on “great terms” and making a “friendship” a “priority” doesn’t sound like Jenner’s previous (but admittedly guarded) comments on their relationship.

For what it’s worth, Scott is yet to make any public comments on this whole situation, but Jenner’s latest statement puts an interesting frame on the allegations.

Or maybe we’re just “The internet” making “everything 100 times more dramatic what what it really is,” like our family has led a reality TV show for a decade or something.
description: Jenner didn't deny she and Scott have broken up in a new statement.
